name: INDIAN SOCIETY OF AGRIBUSINESS PROFESSIONALS

address: B-1/B-1, Mohan Cooperative Industrial Estate,  Mathura Road

briefDescription: ISAP works towards enhancing livelihood opportunities for the rural poor through interventions that include agricultural and livestock development, skill development, multiple user of water, improved sanitation, and women empowerment. ISAPâ€™s special focus is on small and marginal farmers, BPL youth specially from the SC/ST/OBC, minorities and women. ISAP has contributed to enhancing livelihood opportunities for more than 150,000 farmer households, 4200 Agri-preneurs, 8000 BPL youths, and 15,000 women in 3500 villages, 250 blocks, 70 district in 17 states in India.We are also one of the largest networks of agriculture and allied sector professionals in India, and have field presence in 17 states in India.
